explains: adv. 顺便说一句；偶然地；附带地，伴随地

sentences.en: Incidentally, have you heard the news about Sue?
sentences.cn: 顺便问一句，你听说过休的事了吗？

sentences.en: The information was only discovered incidentally.
sentences.cn: 这个信息只是偶然得到的。

sentences.en: "I didn't ask you to come. Incidentally, why have you come?"
sentences.cn: “我没有叫你来。顺便问一下，你为什么来呢？”
